short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn Excel 365 and Google Sheet shortcuts the easy way

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to sheetshortcut for Excel and Google Sheets!

Are you tired of constantly having to look up keyboard shortcuts to format your spreadsheets? sheetshortcut has got you covered.

With this extension, a small toast/popup will appear on your screen every time you manually invoke a shortcut in Excel or Google Sheets. This way, you can easily learn and remember the most commonly used shortcuts, like CTRL + B (windows) or CMD + B (mac) to make text bold.

In addition to showing you the shortcut, the extension also provides a brief description of what the shortcut does. This can be especially helpful if you are new to spreadsheet software and want to learn more about the various formatting options available.

sheetshortcut is easy to use and completely free. Simply install the extension and start using it right away. It's the perfect tool for anyone looking to save time and boost their productivity while working with Excel or Google Sheets.

So why wait? Try sheetshortcut today and start using keyboard shortcuts like a pro!
